arm_group.description: Subjects with chronic hepatitis B or hepatic cirrhosis B to whom adefovir tablets are administered

brief_summary.textblock:
This post-marketing surveillance (PMS) is conducted to collect safety and efficacy data
      among subjects with chronic hepatitis B and hepatic cirrhosis B who is treated with adefovir
      tablets.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug Use Investigation for HEPSERA (Adefovir) Tablet

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Subjects with chronic hepatitis B or hepatic cirrhosis B

          -  Subjects treated with adefovir tablets

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  None

study_pop.textblock:
Subjects with chronic hepatitis B or hepatic cirrhosis B who are confirmed of hepatic
        function abnormality with continuous re-proliferation of hepatitis B virus while treated
        with lamivudine

intervention.description: Administered according to the prescribing information in the locally approved label by the authorities.

clinical_study.official_title: Drug Use Investigation for HEPSERA (Adefovir) Tablet

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices Agency

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence of adverse drug reactions

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
